snippet: Richard G. Lugar, a six-term Republican senator from Indiana, lost his bid to stay in office after Richard E. Mourdock, his Tea Party-backed rival, questioned his conservative credentials.
abstract: Richard G. Lugar, a six-term Republican senator from Indiana, lost his bid to stay in office after Richard E. Mourdock, his Tea Party-backed rival, questioned his conservative credentials.

headline.main: Mourdock Defeats Lugar in Indiana Senate Primary
